definition[0]: to leave your job or official position, because you want to or because you think you should
example[0]: Morris should step aside until the investigation is completed.
example[1]: Eve Johnson has stepped down as chairperson.
example[2]: He was forced to step down from his post.
definition[1]: to leave your job or official position
example[3]: Eve has stepped down as chairperson.
example[4]: The director is stepping down in favour of a younger man.
